Company Name

<JD_START>
Job Title: Accounts Payable Specialist

Location: Racine, WI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting? Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Growing organization, highly stable, great company who treats their employees well! Generous benefits!

This Jobot Consulting Job is hosted by Chelsea Piekarski

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $60,000 - $70,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are a company with strong market presence with tenured and stable ownership.



Why join us?


Great benefits!Promotional Opportunities!AutonomyGreat leadership

Job Details

This is a contract to hire role – you get platinum benefits on the contract side. A $250 medical deductible plan (we cover 75% of the premium), dental, vision, 401K, etc… When you convert, you get access to our clients incredible benefits!

Job Summary

The Accounts Payable Specialist will be responsible for managing and processing all invoices and ensuring that payments are made in accordance with company policies and in compliance with financial practices. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of accounting principles, with specific expertise in construction industry payments and compliance requirements.

Key Responsibilities

 Process invoices using 3-way match to confirm that orders correspond to receipts and invoice details. Code invoices accurately to the appropriate general ledger accounts to ensure proper entry into the financial system. Conduct regular reconciliations of accounts payable transactions to ensure accurate and current account balances. Manage monthly closing of financial records and posting of month-end information to ensure timely reporting. Maintain and verify Certificates of Insurance (COIs) to ensure compliance with contractual obligations. Prepare and submit 1099 forms annually in accordance with IRS guidelines. Respond to vendor inquiries and resolve any discrepancies in billing. Assist with financial audits by providing necessary documentation and explanations for accounts payable processes. Implement process improvements in the accounts payable area to enhance workflow efficiency.

Qualifications

 Associate's degree in Accounting preferred but not required Minimum of 4 years of accounts payable experience, preferably in the construction industry. Strong understanding of accounting software and proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Excellent attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously. Strong organizational and communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Preferred Qualifications

 Experience with construction accounting software. Familiarity with job costing and construction-specific financial practices.

We Offer

 Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunities for professional growth and development. A supportive and dynamic work environment.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot Consulting?

Click our Jobot Consulting logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
